```{r}
#install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
#install.packages("gdata")
library("gdata")
HousingData<- read.csv("HousingDB_post2010_inactive_included.csv")
head(HousingData)
#rename variables
CouncilDistrict<-HousingData$CouncilDst
NewHousing<-HousingData$ClassANet
#create council district and housing unit element
counts.districts <- table(NewHousing, CouncilDistrict)
barplot(counts.districts, main="New Housing by District",
   xlab="Council District")
#create community board and housing unit element
CommunityBoard<-HousingData$CommntyDst
counts.boards <-table(NewHousing, CommunityBoard)
barplot(counts.boards, main="New Housing by CB",
   xlab="Community Board")
mean(counts.districts, trim = 0, na.rm = FALSE)
mean(counts.boards, trim = 0, na.rm = FALSE)
#Add Shape Files
#install.packages("sf")
library(sf)
CouncilDistrictBoundaries<- st_read("nycc.shp")
CBDistrictBoundaries<- st_read("nycd.shp")
```
